item.description:
Hi Folks, Good day to you.

We had a great turn-out on 10/15. Interesting presentations, engaging discussions, accompanied by good food and drink. It's you, the members, that make these events worthwhile.

Looking forward to this next Meetup on 11/12 at the Microsoft New England Research & Development Center - Thank you to Adrian duCille with Greystone Solutions for arranging and sponsoring the location.

This location requires we supply an attendance list in advance, so please provide a firm RSVP and the proper spelling of your name, so you can get into the facility. And please note the time from 7-9pm - in Cambridge.

We have some excellent presenters with very interesting presentations including;
-------------
"AWS: Billing Mechanics and Approaches to Controlling Spend"
Presented by Robert Shear, President, Greystone Solutions, www.greystone.com
-------------
"Mitigating Security Risks in AWS"
Presented by Michael Kurzrock, with Xceedium, www.xceedium.com

-------------
"AWS Environment Best Practices"
Presented by Jeremy Katz, Doer at Stackdriver, www.stackdriver.com
-------------
"Disaster Mitigation: How to Architect and Deploy on AWS for Higher Reliability"
Presented by Mark Estes, Principal Account Manager, Amazon Web Services, New England

-------------

“An implementation of EC2, VPC and VPNs in the AWS environment”
Presented by David Ghikas, Independent Consultant

-------------
Don't miss this event!

Set your calendar and RSVP today! And please include your full name with your RSVP so you can get into the facility - thx!

We are still looking for sponsors for food and drink.

See you soon!

- Mark Annati

group.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

item.name: Meetup on 11/12 at the Microsoft New England Research & Development Center
